title: Indian states and exercising independent power

content.question: Evaluate the extent to which rulers of Indian states could exercise power independently from the British in the period 1750–1900.

frqParts.text: Evaluate the extent to which rulers of Indian states could exercise power independently from the British in the period 1750–1900.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
